title: Man found guilty of manslaughter of his mother in Louth
desc: A 29-year-old man has been found not guilty of murder but guilty of the manslaughter of his mother at her home in Co Louth in 2023.

title: Deportations of Irish citizens from US up 330%, Dáil told
desc: The Dáil has heard that the number of Irish citizens seeking consular assistance about deportation from the US increased by 330% last year.

title: UK hits ‘Sudan’s war machine’ with new sanctions
desc: The UK imposed new sanctions on six key figures fuelling Sudan’s war from both the...

title: UK diplomats fear Mandelson files ‘damaging’ for Trump relationship
desc: U.K. officials say the former ambassador to Washington Peter Mandelson downloaded his thoughts in “real time,” and they fear “damaging” messages will be made public.

title: MPA student awarded scholarship from the American Planning Association
desc: Yoni Preuss (MPA '26) was chosen for the Alex Yerkey Memorial Scholarship in recognition of his commitment to urban planning, transportation, and land use policy.

title: Leicester City points deduction: Championship club docked six points for breaching EFL's profit and sustainability rules
desc: Leicester City now sit 20th in the Championship, outside the relegation zone on only goal difference, after being deducted six points; club found to have breach the EFLs profit and sustainability rules for the 2023/24 season

title: Ly6G+ granulocytes-derived IL-17 limits protective host responses and promotes tuberculosis pathogenesis
desc: The IL-17–Ly6G⁺ granulocyte axis is a key driver and correlate of tuberculosis pathology and represents a potential target for improving vaccine-induced protection and therapeutic outcomes.

title: Horizon Europe EU Missions: €10 million available for new climate and soil projects
desc: New call under Horizon Europe Mission open.
source: European Climate, Infrastructure and Environment Executive Agency

title: Part-time DJ caught with almost €1.5m worth of drugs jailed for five years
desc: Christian Munoz Sanchez, with an address in Barcelona, Spain, pleaded guilty to possession of drugs for sale or supply on May 2nd, 2025.

title: OpenAI is hoppin' mad about Anthropic's new Super Bowl TV ads
desc: Sam Altman calls AI competitor "dishonest" and "authoritarian" in lengthy post on X.
